1b1: 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi// bam po nyi shu brgyad pa// khyod kyi 'dod pa gnas bzang por skyes te/ rgyal po rgyal
1b2: rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dang phrad par bdag gis bya'o/ / des de rgyal po shar ba dang lhan cig phrad par byas te/ nor lhas byin de dang lha
1b3: cig shin tu chags par gyur pa dang / gser phred can gyis sbyor ba 'chang la lha ni gson te/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi sras mo nor lhas
1b4: byin la glang po che'i chog slob po zhes sprid do/ / des kyang rgyan lnga mi mngon par byas nas bdag nyid gos hrul po bgos te/ ming dpyid ldan
1b5: zhes bya bar btags nas smon pa'i cha lugs kyis 'phags rgyal du song ngo / / de der lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum
1b6: mdo dag tu rgyug mchod rgal zhing dpyid ldan dga'o zhes smon tshig kyang smra'o/ / / gang dag gi de sbyor ba 'chang ba yin no zhes deng shes pa de
1b7: dag la ni des rgyan byin pa dang / de dag gis de blangs nas cod mi zer bar 'gro'o// gang dag mi shes pa de dag ni 'di smon pa zhig go zhes
1b8: yal bar gtong ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang khyim bzang po gang du zhugs pa der bza' ba dang / me tog dang / gos dag kyang rnyed
2a1: 6/ / cing shar ba dang lhan cig gsang ste gros gcig go// ji tsam dus gnad zhig na nong lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar ba'i bu la spras pa/ lha gal te na bdag gi phas cher du mchis/ tshur son 'bros so// des smras pa/ lha po gal te de lta na
2a2: song la pha la 'di skad ces ya ba bdag gis glang po che'i tshi ga ni lobs na 'on kyang las su bgyi ba ma mthong ste/ de'i slad du ltas bdag la glang po che mo bzang ldanici bder bgyid du stsol cig dang de la 'tshal nas las dag blta bar bgyi'o zhes kyis shig
2a3: de song nas rgyal po la de bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang glang po che'i rdzi rnams la shes ldan dag glang po che mo bzang ldan bu mo nor lhas byin la ci bder gyis la/ de la zhon nas las dag ltar chug shig ces bsgo'o// de dag
2a4: gis de la glang po che mo bzang ldan ci bder byas pa dang / de rgyal po shar ba'i bu dang ldan cig de la zhon nas 'bros pa'i thabs shom par rtsom ste/ res 'ga' ni snga dro sang zhing nyi ma phyed na slar 'ong / res 'ga' ni nyi ma byed na song zhing byi dro slar 'ong
2a5: res 'ga' ni phyi dro song nas dgongs su slar 'od/ res 'ga' ni dgongs song nas mtshan mo nam phyed na slar 'ong / nges 'ga' ni 'dzang la slar 'od / res 'ga' ni lnga tshigs la slar 'od/ res 'ga' ni nam chung na slar 'ong / res 'ga' ni skya reng shar
2a6: na slar 'ong ngo / / shar bas sbyor ba 'chang las 'bros pa'i thabs smras pa dang / des glang po che'i lci bdag phyir dbyung bar brtsams so// chab sgo ba dag gis smras pa/ dpyid ldan 'di ci yin/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i bshes su
2a7: byas te 'di dag de ral tur 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / de dag gis bgang nas 'di ni smyon pa'o snyam nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// des kyang de dag khyer te kau sham pa'i lam gyi bar bar du shing gi yal ga la sbyangs so// yang glang po che'i gcin dag
2a8: gis bum pa bkang ste bkur bar brtsams pa dang / sgo ba dag gis de bzhin du dris pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i bshos su byas te 'di ni der skyems su 'gyur ro// zhes byas pa dang / de dag de bzhin du 'di ni smyon pa yin no//
2b1: snyam nas bgang de 'khod do// des kyang de khyer te kau sham+bI'i lam gyi bar bar du shing gi yal ga la spangs so// rgyal po shar ba dang / sbyor ba 'chang dang / gser phreng can gyis nyi ma che mo zhig la phyogs che ge mo zhig tu thams cad 'du bar bya'o zhes dus
2b2: btab nas rgyal po shar ba'i bu dang / nor lhas byin glang po che mo bzang ldan la 'on nas phyogs der song ste/ spyor ba 'chang dang / gser phrang can yang de nyid la zhen te/ de rnams pi bang sbran pa len zhing dong ba na/ rgyal po shang ba'i bus pi bar snyan pa blangs
2b3: pa dang / sbyor ba 'chang dga' ba skyes te glu blangs pa/ bzang ldan ma dang byangs stan dang / nor lhas byin dang / shair ba dang // gser phreng can dang dpying ldan dang // 'di dag don 'thun 'dod pa yin// dus gang du de dag slar 'ong ba'i dus de yang myur dmas
2b4: dus tha ma gang yin pa de yang thal nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gsos pa la smras pa/ gsos pa nor lhas byin dang thogs na 'di ci las gyur ces byas pa dang / gsos pas btsal bar brtsams pa las ma rnyed nas/ des rgyal po la smras
2b5: pa/ rgyal po shar ba'i bus glang po che mo bzang ldan la 'tshal te nor lhas byin khrid nas bros lags so// rgyal po sngangs nas smras pa/ gsos pa myur du song la glang po che'i dab bu'i ri la zhon te shar ba dang / nor lhas byin khrid de shog shig/ de rings
2b6: pa rings par glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon nas bsnyags so/ / des bstags te slebs la thug nas sbyor ba ba rang gis glang po che'i lto ba'i thum po bshog pa dang / 'dam bu'i ris des bsnams par brtsams so// ji srid sdom pa de'i bar du glang
2b7: po che mo bzad ldan gyis dpag tshad bcu 'das so/ / yang 'dam bu'i ris slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang gis gcin gyi bum pa gcag pa dang / 'dam bu'i ris de bsnams par brtsams so// ji srid snom pa de'i bar du glang po che me bzang ldan gyis
2b8: dpag tshad gzhan bcu 'das te/ gzhan gyi yul du phyin par gyur pa dang / gsos pas bsams po 'di ni gzhan gyi yul yin pas glang po che 'dam bu'i ri yang shor du 'ong gis ldog go snyam nas de res thag chad de slar log go/ rgyal po gtum po rab
3a1: snang gas smras pa/ gsos pa ci grag/ des smras pa/ lha ci zhig gda' khros lags mod ces byas pa dang / rgyal po lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// rgyal po shar ba'i bu yang srog stong ba las rma
3a2: rnyed de/ kau sha m+bi 'ongs nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / phu nu dang / gnyen rnams la sbyin pa dag byin zhing dga' ston chen po byas nas nor lhas byin dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
3a3: mgur spyod par byed do/ / dus gzhan zhig na'ang bzangs kyi thog tu byung nas nor lhas byin dang lhan cig du bre mo gtam dag zer zhing 'khod pa las smras pa/ lha mo khyod kyang ngas de ltar smras phrogs pa yin no// des smras pa/ lha khyod kyang de ba'i
3a4: du bdag gi phas thabs kyis bzung ste bzhag pa lags so/ / des smras pa/ lha mo ji ste khyo kyi pha 'dir bkug ste tha ga pa'i las slob tu ma bcug na/ nga rgyal po shar ba'i bu ma yin du zad ces byas pa dang / de khros bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug
3a5: go/ / rgyal po shar bas sbyor ba 'chang la smras pa/ nga'i mi dga' ba khyod kyis bstsal bar nus sam/ lha ci zhig bgyi/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang mgul pa nas thogs te 'dir khug la thag pa'i las slob tu chug shig/ des smras pa/ lha
3a6: gang gi tshe khyod kyis nor lhas byin dang glang po che mo bzang ldan phrogs pa'i tshe don gyis na khyod kyi mi bgyis pa bstsal lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang gal te rdo thog kyang gdas bsams te bgyi'o zhes byas te/ des 'phags rgyal du 'gro ba'i zod
3a7: dag sta gon byas nas ded dpon sprob bskyed de/ smad 'tshong ma gzugs dang na tshed dang ldan pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhig kyang de dpon gyi chung mar byas nas de rim gyis zong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho zang rnam
3a8: sa tshong dus dag lta zhing 'phags rgyal du phyin to/ / rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis nor mang po dang ldan pa'i ded dpon zhig 'ongs so zhes thos so// des thos nas kyang bdag nyid nor rtsing song ste nges 'dron po de dag la dris pa/ shes ldan
3b1: dag ded dpon gyi khyim gang yin/ de dag gis ded dpon gyi khyim ni 'di yin no zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po der song ste sgor 'dug nas ded dpon gang na 'dug ces dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ sgor byung ste song ngo // des smras pa/ 'di nas 'drag
3b2: de rnams kyis smras pa/ ded dpon gyi chung ma mchis so// des sgo gtan phye ste nang du zhugs pa dang ji tsam na ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs dang na tshod bzang bas 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhig
3b3: mthong ngo / / des de mthong nas kyang rab tu chags par gyur te smras pa/ bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na ded dpon gyi sho ga ma gtad ngo do// des smras pa/ gal te de lta na mal 'dir 'dug shig ces byas pa dang / 'dod chags kyis
3b4: log par gyur pas ni mi bya ba ci yang med pa'i phyir de der 'dug pa dang / rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis sgo bcad de khyogs su bcug nas ma bzhis bteg te klu len cing skyo cig nas 'phags rgyal du zhugs so// de kha cig ni thal mo rngog kha cig
3b5: ni rgod/ kha cig ni 'di skad du glu len te/ sbrang ma dag gis zla ba zos// rnam thos bu ni gnyer bas ded// sa gzhi nags bcas mkha' la 'phags// smad 'tshong mas ni rab snang khrid/ ces byas pa dang / 'phags rgyal na gnas pa
3b6: rnams kyis bsams pa/ ci'i phyir tshor pa 'di dag de skad ces zer snyam pa las/ de rnams sgo gzhan du byung ste/ spyugs bcad de bros te song ngo // gsos pa yang phan tshun du rgyal po tshol zhing de rim gyis kau sham+bir song ngo // blon po
3b7: ngag gis rgyal po shar ba la smras pa/ lha dgyes lnga mdzad du gsol rgyal po rab snang ni 'dir lugs lags so zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po shar bas smras pa shes ldan dag deng la de thogs te thag pa'i las slob tu chug shig/ rgyal po dang
3b8: snad 'dir 'ongs par nor lhas byin la su yang ma zer cig bar khrims su yang chos shig ces bsgo'o/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shar ba'i bu nor lhas byin dang lhan cig tu khang bzangs kyi steng du byung ste/ 'dug pa na rgyal po gtum po
4a1: rab snang thags kyi gra khang nas bya ba zhig gi phyir sgor byung ba dang rgyal po shar bas de mthong nas/ des nor lhas byin la smras pa/ mo'i ni su yin khyod kyis shes sam/ des kyang ring zhig tu brtags pa dang / rgyal po de ste
4a2: gcer yin pas ngo shes nas de mchi mas brnangs bzhin du 'dug ste des bsams pa/ rgyal po ngan pa 'dis nga'i pha 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su byas kyis gal te rgyal po ngan pa 'di ma bsad na nor lhas byin ma yin du zad/ ji ltar
4a3: bsad pa yang bdag nyid kyis mi tsher ba de ltar gsad do snyam mo/ / rgyal po de yang yid no ba zhig pas de khros par shes nas des sbyor ba 'chad la bsgo ba/ sbyor ba 'chang dgra la sha lon zin gyis song la rgyal po gtum po rab sdang khrel
4a4: tekhrus gyis zan byin la bkur sti chen pos 'phags rgyal du stsol cig ces bsgo ba dang / des kyang ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du 'phags rgyal du bskyal to// nor lhas byin gyis bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis 'dir nyid gsad pa'i thabs brtsams
4a5: na g.yon can 'dis 'phrigs par 'ong bas dus chung zhig gis bar du bring do snyam nas/ des de la re shig cung zad cig rgad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dag gis brid do// de nas de gos dri ma can gyon te khri'u dra ba can la nyel
4a6: zhing 'dug pa dang / rgyal po shar ba'i bus smras pa/ lha mo 'di ci tha tshig/ des smras pa/ lha lha rnams 'khrugs lags so// des smras pa/ lha mo mi bdog gam/ ci ji ltar dam bcas pa gzhan gyis shig/ des smras pa/ lha gang bdang /
4a7: gis dam bcas pa de mi 'grub lags mod/ rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis dam ci bcas/ gang gis na khyod mi dga' bar gyur pa spros shig dang / thams cad yangs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod mi dga' bar ma byed cig/ nges smras pa/ gci
4a8: tshe bdag gi phas lha bzung ste bzhag pa de'i tshe bdag gis lha la 'di skad du ji ste lha dang bdag ci lhan cig bde legs su kau sham+bir phyin ne/ der lha dang bdag lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du zas mi bza' zhing zhag bdun 'das nas/ lha ni meto//
4b1: gi phreng bas rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi ba'i bar du dkris ter ba'i khar 'dug par bya'o// bdag ni dka' thub rdzogs nas bram ze stong la zan byin la mchod pa dang bkur sti cher bya'o zhes dam bcas nad lha btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che bar gyur pas ci'i
4b2: slang du 'di lta bu mdzad par 'gyur snyam du bdag de sems shing mchis te/ mdor na gum lags su bas so// rgyal pos smras pa/ lha mo khyod kyis lha la gsol ba btab pa yang don gyis na nga'i ched len yin pas longs shig dang thams cad bab
4b3: par bya'o zhes byas pa dang / da langs te ngas khyi gu gnyis shigar ba'i drang du btags te bzhag nas/ de ji tsam mi tsam gyi sha za nus pa de tsam du sha gong nas gong du bskyed de byin no// gang gi tshe khyi gu de gnyis shang tsam za nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po dang
4b4: lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dug cing de ni mtshan mo za/ rgyal po shar ba ni chung ma de la chags pas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du ma zos pas de lus skya bo bseng bseng po gyur cing sha bri ngan pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rtsu bar gyur to// zhag bdun lon
4b5: pa dang nor lhas byin gyis me tog phreng rgyud mkhan rnams la yang rgyus pa dag gis me tog dri zhim po dag rgyus la myur du khyer te shog shig ces bsgo'o/ / sbyor ba 'chang la yang deng du lha'i dka' thub rdzogs kyis khyod kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la bram ze
4b6: stong dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zan sbyor cig ces bsgo'o// blon po gzhan dag ni mi tsher ba bya ba'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan dag tu las su bskos so// sbyor ba 'chang yang rgyal
4b7: po la snying nye zhing rjes su chags pas grong khyer de rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo no med par byas/ tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/ bdug pa dri zhim po'i pog phor ni bzhag/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag ni sbeng mu tig dang / dar gyi chun po dang / lnga ldi
4b8: ni sbyangs/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ni bkram ste lha rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas nas gnas dang gnas rnams su rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs ni bsgrags/ gar mkhan dang / snyan dngags mkhan dang / 'jo tshar can
5a1: gyi bro mkhan rnams kyis ni bro gar bya bar brtsams so/ / ca co chen po byung ba de'i tshe nor lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar ba'i bur ba'i khang rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du me tog gis dkris nas bsnyal lo// de nas ra ba'i khan drapa sa
5a2: ljang ma thag tu gson por khyi dag gis rus gong 'ba' shig lus par byas te/ bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / wa dang / mi ro la za ba'i srog chags gzhan dag kyang 'thab par gyur to// kau sham+bi lha ra ba'i kha nas grong khyer mdzes pa lta ba las
5a3: ltung ste/ khyi dag gis zos so zhes ku co'i sgra cher gyur pa dang / de na kha cig ni du/ kha cig ni dga'/ kha cig ni tha mal bar 'dug/ kha cig ni 'phrog rlom byed par gyur to// ku co chen po byung ba de'i tshe kau sham+bi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag so
5a4: sor bros nas kha cig ni mnyan yod du song ngo / / kha cig ni gnas gzhan dang gzhan du song ngo // skabs der sbyor ba 'chang ba dang / blon po gzhan rnams dang / kau sham+bi na gnas pa'i me'i gtso bo dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis
5a5: cho zhi bar byas te de nas sbyor ba 'chang gis ji ltar rgyal por ba'i khar song / ji ltar ra ba'i drung na khyi 'dug par gyur ces kun tu brtag par brtsams so// des de ltar brtags pa dang / nor lhas byin gyis ji ltar thabs kyis bsad pa rtsad
5a6: chotsho de de khros nas nor lhas byin rgya skyugs kyi khang par bcug ste ba sregs so/ / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po shar ba'i bras las ci zhig
5a7: bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas khyi dag gis 'tshal te dus las 'das lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po shar ba'i bu nyid kyis las cho gas rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar
5a8: gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag rgyal po shar ba'i bus las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan sus so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams
5b1: ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag kho na la
5b2: rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang // las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin// dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na bram ze mdun na
5b3: 'don zhig 'dug go/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas phongs pa dang / dman pa la thugs brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas yal dag la dga' ba/ sbyin gnas gcig pur gyur pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung bas rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs
5b4: rgyub rgyu zhing ri 'or der phyin pa dang / phyogs zhig tu nub mo gnas so// de phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs nas ri 'or gyi grong der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / mdun na 'don de yang khyi khrod nas phyir byung ste/ des
5b5: rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa de la khyi sprad do/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems mdun na 'don gang yin pa de ni rgyal po shar ba'i bu 'di yin te/ 'dis de'i tshe de'i dus na rang sangs rgyas nyes pa med cing gnod
5b6: pa mi byed pa la khyi spang ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar khyis zos nas dus las 'das te/ da ltar gyi bar du yang khyis zos te dus las 'das par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams
5b7: kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/ 'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma ste/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig du gnag pa dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba
5b8: dag kho na la brtsal bar byas te/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la yid rangs te mngon par bstod do// rgyal po shar ba'i bu
6a1: dus las 'das nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'gran zla med par rgyal po byed par gyur to/ / de dus gzhan zhig na khang bzangs kyi steng du byung nas blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor te gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer zhing 'khod de/ shes
6a2: ldan dag grong dang grong khyer dang gnas gang na smang 'tshong ma bzang mo yod/ blon po rnams kyis spras pa/ lha rdo 'jog na smad 'tshed ma bzang mo zhes bgyi ba gzugs dang na chod dang ldan pa sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi la mkhas pa zhig mchis te/ mthong ma
6a3: thag tu chags par mi 'gyur ba'i mi gang lags pa de ni sa'i steng na 'ga' yang ma mchis so/ / rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i gzugs dang natshad dang ldan pa thos nas thos ma thag tu chags par gyur te smras pa/ gsos pa ci byas kyang mi pan de
6a4: lta bu'i bud med la dga' mgur spyad dgos pas rdo 'jog tu song ste de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/ / des smras pa/ lha rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi gshed mar gyur pa/ phyir rgol bar gyur pa/ mi mdza' bar
6a5: gyur pa lags la/ de ni rtag tu rdo 'jog na mchis lags pas ji ste lha rdo 'jog tu gshegs na gdon mi 'tshal bar des lha brlag par bgyid lags so// des smras pa/ mi rnams kyi nang na mi gzu lums can dag lta yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod
6a6: ni 'di na 'dug shig/ nga ni 'gro'o// des smras pa/ ji ste lha de lta bur dgyes na lha nyid mkhyen mod kyi/ 'on kyang bag mdzad pa'i rigs so// rgyal po rab snang bud med la brkam chags can yin pas des de'i tshig ma mnyan nas glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i
6a7: ril zhon te rdo 'jog tu song ngo / / de rim gyis song nas gtun shing ri la phyin pa dang / des der glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bzhag nas rdo 'jog tu song ngo // de nas mu tig gi do shal srang brgya stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te bzang mo gzugs kyis
6a8: 'tshe ba'i gan du song nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag shes ldan dag rgyal po mi snang na gar bzhud ces dpyod pa la zhugs pa dang / de na kha cig
6b1: gis smras pa/ de ci mi phal pa yin nam/ des ni mi mngon mngon par 'gyur du zad kyi/ de gang yang ni ma bzhud do// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi che ba yin pas ci'i phyir phyi rol tu 'byung ste/ btsun mo'i 'khor nyid na dga' ba dang /
6b2: rtsed mo so sor nyams su myong bar byed do// kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la the tshom byar ci yod/ tshur sheg gsos pa la 'drir 'dod do// kha cig gis legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas de dag thams cad 'bru te gsos pa'i drang du dong nas smras pa/
6b3: gsos pa lha mi snang na gshed du ma bzhud grang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci rings mthong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gis smras pa/ gsos pa ji srid na mthong bar 'gyur/ des smras pa/ lo bcu gnyis lon nas so// de dag khros nas smras pa/ gsos
6b4: pa gang gi phyir de skad smras pa las na gdon mi za bar khyod kyis lha bsad nas bdag nyid rgyal srid byed par 'dod do/ / de'i phyir re shig gal te zhag bdun na lha ltar yod na de lta legs ji ste med na ni nged kyis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes/
6b5: byas pa dang / de cang mi zar bar lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas bos nas bos te dris pa/ gsos pa khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ des smras pa/ lha
6b6: po bram ze dag 'di skad ces mchi na ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi mchis/ des smras pa/ gsos pa gal te de ltar na song la nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa gser snod kyi nang du lugs te/ rta mang lag la rgyas pa gang yin pa de'i
6b7: mdun du zhog la 'di skad ces gang zhig deng nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro ba de nas kyi cha sa mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo shig ces smos la de ltar bya ste rta bzang po gang gis zos pa de nga la sbron cig/ gsos pas ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin/
6b8: du byas na 'ga' yang za bar spro ba med do// phyogs gzhan zhig na rta ring rke ba lus rma bar gyur pa/ dan ma za ba/ dbugs rgod pa/ rna ba chag pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung du de song ste mdun du 'dug nas/ gang zhig deng nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar
7a1: spro ba de nas kye chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo shig ces smras pa dang / des de dag zos so// gsos pa song nas/ ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gsos pa song la stod cig
7a2: gal te stong pa'i tshe mi srun byed na khyod kyis mi 'jigs par spungs skyed cig/ / sems stobs dang ldan pa la ni sus kyang mi rje'o// dasong nas de bstod par brtsams pa dang / de stod pa'i tshe rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs su bdag nyid
7a3: sprul nas/ kwa'i mi khyod kyis sngon chad 'di lta bu'i rta mthong ba 'ga' yod dam zhes smras so// des ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsdigs nas kwa'i rta'i srin po khyod kyis sngon chad rta zhon pa su la yang lcag 'di lta bu mthong ba yod dam zhes smras pa dang
7a4: des smras pa/ kye mi sngon ma mthong ngo // des kye rta'i srin po gal te re shig mi srun mi byed na de lta na legs/ ji ste byed na mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la dor bar bya'o// des smras pa/ kye mi ji ste de lta na gal te bdag phyir 'dir khrid de mi 'ong bar dam 'chal
7a5: na 'gro'o/ / des smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin dus byas 'dod do zhes smras nas/ des de la zhon te song nas rim gyi rdo 'jog tu phyin to// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis mthong nas smras pa gsos pa 'ongs sam/ des smras pa/
7a6: mchis so// dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir zhes byas pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa'i rnams brjod do// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa re shig zhag bdun gyi bar du rtses la zhag bdun 'das pa dang dus shes par bya'o zhes byas nas zhag bdun gyi bar
7a7: du gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad de zhag bdun 'das nas song ngo / / gtun shing ri ri phyin nas bdag nyid kyis glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam pa'i ri bstad par brtsams pa dang / des bstad pa na skad byung ba/ de dang mi
7a8: ring bzhig na bram ze ltas mkhan long bzhig gnas pa des thos nas/ des smras pa/ glang po che'i gtso bo 'di'i skad dang sbyar na/ 'di ni 'di nas dpag tshad brgyar song nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgya
7b1: po rab snang dang gsos pa glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ril zhon te song ngo / / re shig cig na phyogs shig na rdza mkhan zhig 'dug pa de'i snod so ma btang ba dag cig 'dam bu'i ro'i rkang pas brdzis nas rdza mkhan gyis mya ngan bya bar brtsams
7b2: ba dang / gsos pas smras pa/ gang dgasas 'tshe ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro// rgyal po rnams ni khwa bzhin du 'phrig za ba yin pas rgyal po rab snang gis bsams pa/ gsos pa 'di bdag la zung za ste/ de ci bdag gcig brams
7b3: ba yin nas 'jal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo / / yang phyogs shig na zing ril gyis la ma kar tshang bcas pa de'i sgo nga dga' dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas bcom nas kyang des kyang mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang / gsos pas spras pa/
7b4: gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro// rgyal po rab snang de bzhin du rtog pa skyes nas bsams pa/ yang 'di bdag la zur za ste/ ci smad 'tshod ma bdag gi spyod yul ma yin nas mjal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zang
7b5: bar song ngo / / yang 'dam bu'i ri shing drung na mar song ba dang / shing de'i yal ga la sbrul zhig gnas pa des bstabs nas rgyal po rab skad bza' bar brtsams so// re shig na gsos pas mthong nas des de ral gri shubs nas phyung ste dum bu dum bur
7b6: gtubs nas sa la bor ba dang g.yo zhing 'gul pa gsos pas bltas te smras pa/ gang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro// rgyal po rab snang de kho na bzhin du rtog pa skyes nas bsams pa/ 'di bdag la
7b7: lan gsum gyi bdud zur zaste/ ci smad 'tsho bdag gis don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nas 'jal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo do// dus gzhan zhig na 'das bu'i ribang thags song nas rgyal pos de bzung ba dang mthub nas gso
7b8: bas smras pa/ lha bram ze ltas mkhan gyis 'di dpag chad brkyar song nas ste phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyida'i slad du myar du shing gi yal ga la 'jus te glang po ma thong shig ces byas pa dang / des myur ba myur
8a1: ba shing gi yal ga la 'jus so/ / gsos pas kyang shing gi yal ga la 'jus pa dang 'dam bu'i ri 'das te song ngo // rgyal pos gsos pa la smras pa/ gsos pa song la mtshor bar zhi ba la lha ni byon nas bskyed mos tshal na bzhugs so// zhes gyis shig
8a2: de song nas de la brjod pa dang / de dga' ba skyes nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go// rgyal pos kyang stor khung nas 'dzul bar brtsams pa las/ re shig na bu mo gnyis shig bshangs sar byung ba dang / de na gcig gis smras pa/ grogs mo lha 'ongs so zhes grag
8a3: go/ / gcig shos kyis de stor khung nas 'dzul lo zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos thos nas des bsams pa/ gsos pa la bdag gis khyod kyis ma tshor ba zhi ba la smros shig ces bsgo na des khyim na 'dug sa ril la smras so snyam du bsams te de khros nas
8a4: des gsos pa la ji ltar gyur pa dran par byas nas glan ka btsal ba/ gsos pa khyod ko da la gnod pa byed par zhugs pa lta gcig pu sas 'tsho ba yin nam/ ci na gang gi phyir khyod kyis ngal phyogs che ge mo zhig tu gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur
8a5: ro/ / zhes zur za/ smad 'tshong ma nga'i spyod yul ma yin nam cin yang phyogs shig tu gang dag spyod yul ma yin pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur za/ smad 'tshong ma ngas don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nam cin yang phyogs shig tu yang gang dag don du gnyer
8a6: ba bya ba ma yin ba don druganyer ba de dag 'di lta'i 'gyur ro zhes zung ba/ dgazod kyang babyed mos tshal na 'dug pas khyod song la ma tshor bar zhi bal la byon te bskyed mos tshal na bzhugs so// zhes gyis shig ces bsgo bsgon/ khang kyi thom na 'dug pa
8a7: ril la spras pas khyod ni de la gnod pa byed par zhugs so/ / de dogs shing mi dga' nas yid ches par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/ lha sdig pas ni brlab ste bdag gis lhal zur bgyis pa ma mchis so// bdag gis lha la ji ltar zung bgyis/ lha 'dis
8a8: d u gnas che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag sas 'tshe ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni phyogs der rdza mkhan gyi snod so ma btang ba dag cig 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas brdzis nas rdza mkhan des mya ngan gyi
8b1: bar brtsams pa dang / bdag gis de las bsams nas/ 'di skad du gang dag sas mtsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis pas pas so// phyogs cheg mo zhig tu khyod kyis dal gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur/
8b2: ngo zhes zur byas so zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa ni phyogs der srog chags thing ril gyi sgo nga dag cig 'dam bu'i ro'i rkang pas bcom nas de yang mya ngan byed par brtsams pa dang / bdag gis de las bsams nas 'di skad du gang dag spyod yul
8b3: ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par byas so/ / phyogs che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis de la gang dag don du gnyer ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni byes
8b4: der shing gi yal ga la sbrul zhig gnas pa des brlabs nas lha bza' bar brtsams pa dang / bdag gi ral gri shubs nas phyung ste dum bu dum bur bcad nas des la lhung ba dang / bdag gis de las bsams nas/ 'di skad du gang dag
8b5: don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par bas so/ / des khyod la ma tshor bar zhi ba la lha bskyed mos tshal na zhugs so zhes gyis shig ces byas na khyod kyi khyim na gnas pa ril la smras
8b6: so/ / zhes gsung ba gang lags pa de yang bdag gis ma tshor ba kho nar zhi ba la bgyis na bdag ji ltar lha la gnod pa bgyid par zhugs pa lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis de la len thams cad legs par glan na/ nga gzod/
8b7: nga stor khung nas 'dzul ba nang bdag nyid kyis bud med gnyis shig las gcig gis grogs mo lha byon to zhes grag ge zhes byas pa dang / gcig shos na re de stor khung nas 'dzul le zhes zer ba thos na de sus byas zhig gu lha de dag ni pra men
8b8: ma lags na lags kyang 'tshal mod/ der yang de dag gis lha la gnod pa ma bgyis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de de lta yin mod kyi ngas khyod bgams par zad kyis mi dga' bar ma byed cig/ 'on kyang ngardo 'dog
9a1: du song pa'i tshe bram ze gang rag gis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar brtsams pa de dag thag gzhug pa'i dus 'di yin pa ma de rnams gsad par bya'o/ / des smras pa/ lha bram ze rnams re shig gzhag tu gsol/ phra man ma de rnams de dpa
9a2: par bgyi'o/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa de rnams ji ltar gsad par nus/ lhabadag gis de rnams khams pa'i thabs shig bgyi'o// gsos pa legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces byas pa dang / gsos pas mdun na 'don gyi khye'u rig sngags
9a3: spa mkhas pa zhig yod pa de'i drung du song nas bu phra men ma 'di dag skye ba mang po gsod par byed na/ de dag gzung bar bya ba'i thabs de 'ga' yod dam zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa yab ci bzhir mchis bdag gis gzung bar bas so//
9a4: bu legs so zhes byas pa dang / des mi'i lag pa las ud pa la 'dra bar bsgyur nas mi'i lag tu bskur te smras pa/ kye mi khyod song la srang du phyin nas 'dug la/ su rin gyis nyo ba de la ma sbyin par gang zhig mthong na dgod pa de'i ming dris te
9a5: glegs bral bris shig/ des de thogs te 'dug nas gang zhig rin gyis nyo ba de la mi ster/ gang zhig mthong nas dgod pa de'i ming ni dris nas glegs bul 'bri bar byed de/ res de ltar 'phags rgyal gyi phra men ma lnga brgya'i ming dris nas bris so//
9a6: de nas gsos pa la bstan nas gsos pas kyang rgyal po la bstan pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa phra men ma gang po 'di dag ci ltar kha gtag/ des smras pa/ lha de rnams ji ltar dgum pa'i thabs bdag la 'tshal gyis lha thugs khral
9a7: bskrad du gsol/ des smras pa/ gsos pa lags te khyod nyid shes so// des 'phags rgyal gyi phyogs shig tu 'khor gyi khyams shig byas nas/ des lA ni ma'i dam tshig la 'jug gis 'phags rgyal na sring mo ji snyed gnas pa thams cad
9a8: gyi byams su 'du bar gyis shig ces dril bsgrags pa dang / de dag gis bsams pa/ lba 'khor gyi khyams su ma'i dam tshig la 'jug pa der bdag cag la rjes bzang po mang du ster gyis 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas gang dag mi mngon par 'dug 'a/
9b1: pa de dag kyang rnyed pa la chags pas bdag nyid nye bar bstan te sring mo lnga baN+Da lhag tsam 'khor gyi khyams su lhags sa// de nas mdunan 'don kyigyi bris des de dag thams cad rig sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang / gsos pas kyang de rnams/
9b2: kha btag go// rgyal pos 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams bos nas shes ldan dag bdag gis phra ma nam 'di snyed cig bsad pas bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed kyis khyod kyis bdag 'khor ba'i dgon pa de las dbyung ba'i phyir
9b3: nyin cig bzhin 'khor gyi khyams su 'du zhing zan zo shig ces bsgo ba dang / de rnams kyis shes pa brjod pa byas nas khas blangs so// rgyal po rab snang gis sgo ba la bsgo ba/ kye skyes bu bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyam sun no// napa po bdeg
9b4: thams cad khyod kyis legs par grongs te ngal snyod cig/ des smras pa/ lha de ltar bgyid ste gsol bar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos blon po rnams la yang bsgo bshes ldan dag 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyams su
9b5: za na za ba thams cad la kha zas bsod pa phal cher byen cig/ bram ze rnam ningal cher lho mdu can yin pas rgyal po ngas de ltar byed du bcug go zhes thos nas thams cad lhag nas zan bza' bar brtsams so// de rnams zan zos nas 'tsho
9b6: byams nas phyir byung ba dang / sgobs bgrangs na lhag chang med par bram ze brgyad khri byung ste/ des rtswa bolaH/ lpag chad ma mchis par bram ze brgyad khri mchis so zhes gsol to// rgyal pos gang gis na 'di rnams dus gcig tu
9b7: mgo gcad pa'i thabs de gang yin snyam du bsams nas des zho shes 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ bram ze zan za ba re re'i rgyab tu gshed ma mi ral gri thogs pa re re zhog la/ gang gi tshengs zho 'on cig ces smras pa de'i tshe thams cad kyi mgo tshad
9b8: cig rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de ltar byas pa dang / 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams las 'chi bdag gis zhags pas zin pa brgyad khri tham pa 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus pa de dag sbyor ba des gcig car mgo bcad do/ na 'a'agra
10a1: rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze las bram ze brgyad kyi rgyal por bskang shis bsad do/ / des de dag bsad nas nub mo mal chen por nyal ba na mi lam dus tha'i sgra drug dang / bar snang gi sgra drug ni thos/ rmi lam pa brgyad ni mthong ngo // sa rba'i
10a2: sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltas/ drug/ med/ bdag/ ngan/ sems/ bdag cag 'di rnams shes bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni 'dir tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po yin no// de la drug ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ la ni stong phrag drug
10a3: tsuM dang / / lo ni brgya phrag drug bcu ru// sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi// nam zhig mthar ni byin par 'gyur// med ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ mtha' med mtha' lta ga la yod// da dang khyed cag nyid kyis ni// mtha' nyid dmigs/
10a4: par mi 'gyur ba// de ltar sdig pa'i las byas so// bdag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag/ mthun dang mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa/ gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi// bdag cag sdug bsngalas pa
10a5: can gyur/ ngan zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di na bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan// bdag cag gang bdag de ma btang // longs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe// bdag nyid la ni pa nam byas// sems shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ sems
10a6: kyis sun bslus myur cing/ mi gas pas ni bangs myur ba/ sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi// gta' ni su zhig byed par gyur// bdag cag 'di rnams shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gror// song ste dge ba
10a7: mang byas nas/ / de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing // shis pas byas rnams mtho ris 'dod// bar snang gi sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad/ su// gang / da ni/ de rnams/ 'di dag ces bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang u0f7f/
10a8: bzhin// da la thams cad ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ thams cad gsog tu byung zin te// 'di la stong pa tsam zhig lus// rgyal ba srin de gang ba la/ dga' ba med pas babor// su zhes bya ba las tshags su bca dpa ni/ su nig sa
10b1: len tshul ngan po'i/ / mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa// des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang // bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas// gang zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ rdzing 'di nya dang ru sbal ni// mang po dag gis gang ba las// da ni sbal
10b2: bas 'tsho mod kyi/ / bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro// da ni zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la// bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i// long ba nyon mongs de dag ni// nga ni mgon yang med par gyur/ de rnams shes
10b3: bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las/ chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dag/ bde bla gnyid du rnyed par 'gyur// bdag kyang da ltar der dga'o// 'di dag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di dag khrus byas zos nas ni//
10b4: phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bdag ni sti yis bzung gyur pa// sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas// mi lam bkyang ces bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs pa dang / tsan dan dmar pos gtong ba dang / glad la me
10b5: 'bar ba dang / mtshan khung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba dang / rkang pa gnyis la nya khar pa gnyis ldag pa dang / dang pa gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang / ri nag po zhig mdun na tshur 'ong ba dang / chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba mthong
10b6: ngo/ / de gcid sad nas 'jigs par gyur/ ga/ tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes byed nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chang du mi 'gyur grang snyam mo// des rmi lam de dag bram ze mi lam gyi dpyad shes pa gang dag
10b7: yin pa de dang pos te bsnang ba dang / de dag gis bsams pa/ lus rmi lam de dag bzang po zhig mthong mod kyi 'on kyang bsngags par ni mi bya ste/ gal te bsngags na 'di ji lta ba ngan par gyur nas bram ze lhag ma gang dag yin pa de dag
10b8: kyang ma lus par byang bar 'od do/ / snyam du rig nas gros byas te smras pa// lha rmi lam ni mi bzang pa dag cig go// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'bras bu cir 'gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ gzhi de las lha rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/
11a1: srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis nga rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de lta 'ga' yod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha khyod kyis sdig pa chen po byas
11a2: te bram ze brgyad khri bsad pas de'i slad du gal te spyod na thabs gcig cig mchis so/ / de bram ze bsad pa dran nas snying kun tu 'dar te smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci bya smos shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha bskyed mos chal du rdzing bu rkor stsal te/ bskam
11a3: nas rdo thal gyi nyug tu stsol cig/ de nas der yan lag gi mchog lnga po gsos pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang / skyab seng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang / gzhon nub lang skyong rnams bsad de bcug la de rnams kyi khrag gis khrus mdzad de rdzing//
11a4: phra nas byung la pus mo gnyis sa la gcugs nas bram ze rnams kyi rkang pa la lces lpags nas/ de ltan khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing / srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis yan lag gi mchog gsos/
11a5: ba dang mdun na 'don dang / ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang / skya seng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang / gzhon nu pa lang spyod rnams bsad na bdag rgyal po byas te yang ci rung snyam du bsams nas bram ze rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag byed kyis gang smras pa de ngas thos kyis/
11a6: deng shig dang re shig bsams te bya'o// bram ze rnams dod pa dang de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa pa lang skyong gi mazhi bas mthong ste des smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag 'gam pa la gtad de sems khongs su chung cing bzhug
11a7: des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad de la snyad pa dang / des smras pa/ lha bram ze de dag ni rtag tu mi rigs pa bsten pa lags pas de dag ci 'tshal/ bzhud la 'phags pa kAt+yI bu chen po la zhus shig/ des smras pa/ zhi ba legs so legs so// khyod kyis dus
11a8: su 'phags pa kA tI bu chen po la gtang bas 'gro'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa kA k+Shi bu ga la ba der song ngo / / der song ste song nas tshe dang ldan pa kAN+Di bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po
11b1: gtum po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa kA tI bu chen po 'di ska ces smras so/ / slob dpon katrI bu chen po 'di na bdag mtshan mo mal chen po zhig na nyal zhing mchis pa'i tshe rmi lam dus bla'i sgra drug dang / bar snang gi sgra drug ni thos/ mi lam brgyad ni mthong ste/ sa
11b2: bla'i sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drug med/ bdag/ ngan/ sems/ bdag cag 'di rnams shes bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni 'dir tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po lags so// de la drug ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ lo ni stong phrag drug bcu
11b3: dang / lo na brgya phrag drug bcu ru// sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi// nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur// med ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ mtha' med mtha' lta ga la yod// nga dang khyed cag nyid kyis ni/ mtha' nyid dmigs par mi
11b4: 'gyur ba/ / da ltar sdig pa'i las byas so// bdag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag/ 'thun dang mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa// gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi/ bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur/
11b5: ngan zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di na bdag cag 'tsho bar na// bdag cag gang bdog de ma btang // langs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe// bdag nyid la ni phan ma byas/ sems shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ sems kyis su ni bslus
11b6: gyur cing / mi shes pas ni bangs gyur pa// sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi// gnya' ni su zhig byed par 'gyur// bdag cag 'di rnams shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru// song ste dge ba mang byas nas/
11b7: de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing // shis pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dod// bar snang gi sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad/ su/ gang / da ni/ de rnams/ 'di dag ces bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni tshigs su bcad pa drag gi yi ge dang po lagra/
11b8: so// de la thams cad ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ thams cad gsog tu phyung zin to// de la snying po tsam zhig lus// rgyal po srin de snying po las/ dga' ba med pas re ba por// su zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ su zhig gnyer
12a1: len tshul ngan po'i/ / mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa/ des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang // bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas// gang zhes bya ba la tshigs su bcad pa ni/ rdzing 'di nya dang ru sbal ni// mang po dag gis gang ba las/
12a2: da ni sbal bas 'tsho mod kyi// bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro// da ni zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la/ bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i// long ba nyon mongs de dag ni/ da ni mgon yang med par 'gyur// de rnams
12a3: shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las// chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dag/ bde bla ga nyid du rnyed par 'gyur// bdag kyang da ltar der dga'o// 'di dag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di dang / khrus byas
12a4: zos nas ni/ / phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bdag ni snyi yis bzung gyur pa// sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas// rmi lam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs pa dang / tsan dan dmar pos gtor
12a5: ba dang / glang la me 'bar ba dang / mchan khung gnyis nas sprul gnyis 'phyang ba dang / rkang pa gnyis la nya khar ba gnyis ldag pa dang / dad pa gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang / ri nag po zhig mdun nas tshur 'ong ba dang / chu skyar dag mgo la rtug
12a6: pas 'thor ba mthong ste/ gnyid sad nas 'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes bgyid nas/ gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang skam bgyid do// 'phags pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po la
12a7: bdag don 'di zhun/ gni 'di las bdag rgyal sbrid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur ba lags zang / tshe dang ldan pa kA n+ti bu chen pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen bakhyod kyis sgra de dag dang / rmil ma de dag gzhan 'ga' zhig las
12a8: dam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bsnyad do// su zhig la bram ze rnams la'o// de dag gis khyod la ji skad du lung bstan/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de dag ni rtag tu 'dod pa la longs spyod pa dang na
12b1: ga rte mngon par da pa yin/ / dedag ci shes/ khyod kyi sgrub ra po dag cig thob/ mi lam babang po dgacig kyang mgrang gas kyad pa 'dags shig dang / gnad las byad rnam sri la ma rnams par yang ba 'gyur// srog gi bang du yang mi 'gyur
12b2: ro/ / ci'i phyir nen/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rmilas nas tha'aM// d+hag thos pa gang yin pa dag gi/ lhas yin zhen/ khyod kyi mdun rol gyi rgyal po drug cig gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal sring byed bcug pas lus ni gnas sems can dmyal
12b3: ba rnams sminang du skyes so/ / / 'dul ba ldan chags kyi gzhi/ bam po nyi shu dgug// de na gcig gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngam kyis nyin na mtshigs su bcad pa/ so ni stong mag drug bcudang/ yon brgya zag du/
12b4: bcu ru// sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi// nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba smras so// gnyis pas tshigs su bcad pa/ mtha' med mtha' lta ga la yod// nga dang khyed cag gnyis kyis ni/ mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur ba// de
12b5: ltar sdig pa'i las byas so/ / zhes bya ba smras so// gsum pas tshigs su bcad pa/ bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag/ mthun dang mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa// gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi// bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur/ ces bya
12b6: ba smras so/ / bzhi pas tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di na bdag cag 'tshe ba ngan// bdag cag gang bdog dem btang // longs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid la ni phan pa byas/ zhes bya ba smras so// lnga pas tshigs su bcad pa/ sems kyis su ni sus
12b7: b+hur cing / mi shes pas ni bangs gyur ba/ sems can dmyal bar sdes rnams kyi// gaka' ni su zhig byed par 'gyur/ zhes bya bslus so// drug pas tshogs su bcad pa/ bdag cag 'di rnams pade 'grod// song sde dge ba mang byas na// den
12b8: bsod nams byas gyur cing / / shis pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dod// zhes bya ba smras te/ de dag ni de'i ltas yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bar snang las sgra drug thos pa gang yin pa de gang gi ltas yin zhe na/ khyod kyi khyim gyi gdung ma de la srin bu zhig
13a1: gnas pa nga sa da'i snang po ma yin pa thams cad pas nas snang ma nyan lus pa dang / ra dang mngan pa ma dga' nas chags su bcad pa/ thams cad gas gtu byung ban te// 'dal snying bcam na gsus// rgyal bgran snying po la// dga' ba
13a2: med pas rab ba/ / nas smras so// namam pa'i skang nga pon de yin te/ de bas na khyod kyis phyung la gdung gzhan nig drug shig/ rgyal po chen po gzhan yang khyod kyi rdziganyar len zhes bya ba des bya rog ma'i sgo bzung zhing byung ba rnams bcom pa dang / dbung
13a3: bral bas yid mi bde bskyes/ / snying rjerje skad du zhing dal bus tshigs su bcad pa/ zhig ga N+DIr yin tshul ngan po'i// mig ya gcig cad 'dor byed pa// des ni bdag gi bum dang // bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas/ shes bya ba smras / nam man
13a4: sgra gnyis pa ni de yin gyis/ khyod kyis de 'joms sum bzhug shig/ gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na rtse ba'i rdzing bu bya rog gis btung slebs tsam du chus lang chad du gang ba nya dang / ru sbal dang / sbal ba mang po gnas ba de na chu skyar gcigacig nyad dag za zhing 'dug pa
13a5: les de skams te chu med par gyur pa dang / chu sbyar des de lta bu de mthong nas mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzing 'di nya dang ru sbal ni// mang po dag gis gang ba las// da ni sbal bas 'tshe mod kyi// bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro// zhes bya ba smras te/
13a6: nam mkha'i sgra gsum pa ni de yin gyis khyod kyis de chus 'ong shig/ gzhan yang khyod kyi yul na ri ba sum nan bya ba de gang ba med glang po che mo dmus long zhig gnas te/ de gnyis la bu gcig yod pa de de dag gi rim gro byed do// nga de gnyis kyi zas kyi phyir
13a7: song ba na glang po che mo zhig dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur ba las/ de khyod kyis thabs kyis brongs te khrid de 'ongs nas btags te bzhag pa dang / de ma dang pa'i rjes su mya ngan byed cing rtswa yang mi za chu yang mi 'thung bar de dag rjes su dran zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas
13a8: tshigs su bcad pa/ gang zhig re bo gtum ldan la// bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i// long ba nyon mongs de dag ni// da ni mgon yang med par gyur ces bya ba smras te/ nam mkha'i sgra bzhi pa ni de yin gyis/ pha ma'i grogs byed pa shin mi rung bas khyod kyis de zang
13b1: shig/ gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ri dgas shig bzung ste 'dug pa de bu dang bral bas dgon pa'ir dgranams dran nas tshigs su bcad pa/ rnams mtshan bzang po las/ rdun pas la nang nam pa dang // bde thag nyid du da par 'gyur// bdag kyang da ltar/
13b2: deng dga'o// zhes bya ba smras te/ bar snang gi ste lnga pani de yin gyis khyod kyis dazong shig/ gzhan yang khyod kyis khyi man dang pa dag cig bzung ste 'dug pa de dag gis ngang ba gnam la 'phung bdag mthong nas mi dga'i ste tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di dag khrus byas
13b3: zlas nas ni/ / phyogs da phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bdag ni gyi yis bzung byu ba// sngon ga cig pa ci zhig byas// zhas bya basmras te/ rnams pa'i sadrug pan da yin pas dag kyang khyod kyis gtang bar bya na de dag gi gas yin na// rdul ban
13b4: bo byad kyis tshalam brgyad mthong bgang can pa ci brems yin nan/ rigag na da/ pos lus tha/ ya mang ba ga min pa khyod la las phags kyi rgyal posogs pa drangs pa la matog rgyasas paltar bal mang gags shing du
13b5: stung zhag bdun na byin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam dang po na da'i sngaltas yin no/ / khyod kyis lus la tsan dmadamar pos gtong bar mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod las 'dzin pa rtsal pos la ba rin po che zhig tos su bskur ba lam du 'gas shing 'dra
13b6: de yang / zhag 'dun na byin par 'gyur bas rmi lam gnyis pa ni de'i sgra ltas yin no// spyod kyis zad pal ma'abar bar mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la yul ya ba ni rgyal pos gsar kyi zang bzhi gnas su bskur bal ma dgrags shing 'dugs
13b7: de yang zhag bdun na byin par 'gyur bas rmi la ma gsum pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ / khyod kyis mtshan lung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'byung ba mthong ba gang yon pa ni khyod la rtswa'i rgyal pos ral gri zung tsog skyes su bslang ba lam du zhugs shing 'dun
13b8: da yang zhag bdun na byin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam bzhi pa ni de'i lnga ltas yin no/ / khyod kyis rkang pa gnyis la nya khar ba gnyis ldag pa mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la sing ga la'i rgyal pos nang pa'i lham tha~M cig skyes su bsrung ba lamadu
14a1: zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam lnga pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ / khyod kyis dad pa gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la big la'i rgyal pos rta gnyis shig skyes su bskur ba lam du
14a2: zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bar khyod kyis rmi lam drug pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ / khyod kyis ri nag po zhig mdun nas tshur 'o ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la ka li dkar rgyal pos glang po che'i gtso bo zhig skyes su bskur ba la
14a3: du zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam bdun pa ni de'i sde ltas yin no/ / khyod kyis chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pa bas 'thod pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni khyod dang ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba shes par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis bram
14a4: ze rnams la yang ngan sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rab snang srog ster ba las phyir rnyed pa bzhin du dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshe dang ldan pa ka/
14a5: tI buM chen pos bshad pa la rjes su yi rang nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te song ngo // de rang gi khyim du song nas tshe dang ldan pa kAt+ti bu chen pos ji skad smras pa de thams cad bsgrubs te gdud ma yang gzhan zhig bcug rta rdzi gnyer
14a6: lan yang de ltar byed du ma bcug/ rdzing bu yang chus bkang/ glang po che dang / ri dgas dang / ngang pa rnams kyang btang ngo // zhag bdun na de'i skyes ji skad bstan pa thams cad kyang byin nas de nor rnyed pas yid bde ba skyes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kA ti bu chen po la je sems
14a7: mngon par dad par gyur te bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim na dpal dang dbang thang phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zad yod pa de thams cad ni 'phags pa kAN+Di bu chen po la brten nas byung ba yin no// de'i phyir re shig gos be'u ras yug pa che 'di bskur la phyis rgyal
14a8: srid bstabs par bya'o/ / snyam tu rig nas mi zhig la smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod tshur gos be'u ras yug pa che 'di bskyer la 'phags pa kA t+yI bu chen po la phul cig ces byas pa dang / des gos be'u ras yug po che de khyer nas 'phags pa kAN+DI bu chen po la byin no
14b1: de nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang / skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang / gzhan nub lang bskong dang // gsos pa dang / mdun na 'don la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngal yul sna tshogs la dbang ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis skye ma 'di dag bskur gyis khyed gang ji ltar 'dod
14b2: pa bzhin khyer cig/ de nas pa lang snying gi ma zhi bas ni gser kyi phreng ba khyer/ skyab song ga bum sgrol mas nel ba rin poche/ gzhan nu ba lang skyong gis ni rta gnyis/ gsopa pas ni ral gri zung cig/ mdun na 'don gyis ni nor bu'i lhamazung cig khye
14b3: glang po che'i gtso bo lus pa de rgyal pos khyer ro/ / de nas rgyal po rab snang yan lag gi mchog lnga la rin po che dag gis bgo bsha' byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po gal ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kA tI 'u chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos byan/
14b4: 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ phyogs cig tu 'dug nas rgyal po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa kA tI bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sman 'dogs shing gces spras mdzad pa lags te/ de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa la rgyal srid stobs na
14b5: thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rgyal srid bzhes su gsol/ / tshe dang ldan pa kAt+ti bu chen pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong la rgyal srid byed pa bkag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de ltar na 'dod pa thams cad
14b6: na/ 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spyad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa thams cad kyang bkag go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na longs spyod dang / longs spyod kyi mchog rnams stobs na yongs su
14b7: spyad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po re shig bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa de ltar mdzod cig de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das ni mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
14b8: bzhugs so/ / skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / mi rig pa dang / rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong kA tI bu chen po longs spyod dang longs
15a1: spyod kyi mchog rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi 'od kyang ste bo phyi ma rnams la ban gdags so snyam du dgongs nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/ / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs
15a2: bskyed pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog spyar rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so// gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tsha nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes rgya
15a3: song gi skye gnas su song ba rnams kyi lha spos kyang ci dgos/ don 'dil ni bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA tI bu chen pa'i thugs dang sems su 'phrong ba'i 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA tri ba chen pos lha'i
15a4: da lha'i rna ba mngon par bsgrubs nas phan tshun lta ba dang nyan par yang zhugs so/ / de das bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kA tI bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// tsun pa da rdzo gis dge 'du gyi ched 'ong ba spyod dang pong spyod kyi mchog dag blang du rung lags sam/
15a5: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kAt+ya bu chen po skye ba bya mi rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa pa rnams kyi longs sgyid 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir rung ste/ de lta bas na dge 'dun la longs spyod dang lings spyod kyi mchog rnams gdang gi gang bag la dis
15a6: yin no/ / de la longs spyod na 'di dag yin te/ grong dang / shing rnams so// longs spyod kyi mchog ni ba lang dang / ma te dang / r-i dang / lug rnams so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka trI ba chen pos com ldan 'das la zhus nas rgyal po rab sdang la 'di sa ces rnams
15a7: rgyal ba chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis swa ba phyis rnams la snying bca ba'i phyir dang / spyid padag rnams kyi longs spyod 'bal bar byu ba'i phyir dge 'dun la longs spyod dang langs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po ba snang gi tsha dang ldan pa sa
15a8: tI ba chen po las brten nas yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag 'ang byed du bcug sa/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams kyang phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
15b1: rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag pa'i dge bstad pa'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog par 'dod pa thams cad stobs pa rnams kyi nang na pachog ni 'di lta ste/ 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po rabasdang 'di yin no// dge slong dag pa'i dge bsnyen pa'i nyan thos
15b2: dge 'dun la zug sar ba shos 'bram parnas kyin na martag ni 'dis ste/ rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal po bar sbyangs gzugs cad myong po 'di yin no// dge slong dag pa'i dag bstan pa nyan pas dge 'dun ma rdzog par gnas sal 'phrul pa rnams kyis
15b3: nam chog ni 'di lta ste/ mnyan yod kyi khyis bdag mgon med zas sbyid 'di yin no// dge slong dag pa'i dge bsnyen pa'i nya thos dge 'dun ma thog mar gtug lag yang byed pa rnams kyinang namachog ni 'di lta ste/ yul ba rla/ blo byis bdag pazang
15b4: 'di yin no/ / bar ma ni/ 'dod pa kun gyi rab snang ste// dge 'dun pa shes bye ba tsa sbyangs yon// gnas sa la mag na mad nas spyan to// gtsug lag bang gi bzang ldan do// rgyal por bsnang btsun pa'i 'bang du ris kyis dranapa ste/ nyis gcig
15b5: ba la sbrang gi sa zhiba'i drung du/ gcig ni skya bseng gi bra ma sgrol me'i drung du'o// de dus gzhan zhig na dgongs pas/ ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i thad du zan zab na rgyal bad zhal dga' bas pa lang stong gi ma zho'aphor ba thogs te zan za ba'i mdun na lun
15b6: tsa min phyogs de skye gseng gi bram skal mas / desal bde por bags pa dang / des klag byung ba// byang rgyal po dpalang stong gi pa'i bdang banas ta snang bar byas so// nibs snang ba de mthong das mam tshad stsas te smras pa/
15b7: 'di ci lags// klog cig gro brang dbyung ba/ 'ga' jig gis grags ma 'tshas/ des smras pa/ zha ba 'di klog ga 'ad kyang ba yin/ ma pa' yang ma yi pa/ 'o kya sgru ba sing gi bris la sa phyogs 'di nas song // des la ba ma
15b8: pas 'di ni de'i 'od yin no/ / khyod kyis la ba rin po che de lta bu btang ste gsar kyi 'phreng ba blangs pa ni khyod blun de// ji bdag gi khyim na gser gyi phreng ba med dam/ nyis na rigs ngan pa la sa skyes pa de thega'o// des smras pa/ lha de la de lta bu'i gos/
16a1: rab ga la mchis/ gdon ma 'tshal bar khyod nyid kyis la ba rin po che long shig ces bstan te des na des blangs lags mod/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas de la ma smras te des rang gi blos blangs so// khyod kyis smras so// ngas ma smras so zhes
16a2: de gnyis 'thabs par gyur nas/ zhi bas de'i mgor zho'i phor bas bsnun pa dang / rgyal po de spyi gcer zhig pas de'i glad pa zhom mo// des lag pas mnams te bsams pa/ bdag gi glad pa yang zhom/ bdag gi glang rgyas kyang lug pas 'dis ye
16a3: bdag bsad kyis ji srid srog dang ma bral gyi bar du ji 'di gsad do snyam nas/ des gsos pa la bsgo ba/ gsos pa ngas pa lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongs su btang gis sod cig/ gsos pas byasams pa/ de 'di la shin tu 'phangs na 'di khros pa'i
16a4: kun nas dkris pas 'di skad du zer bar zad pas 'phral la gsad par mi bya'i kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas bsams pa shes par bya ste gsad kyis re shig gnas dben pa zhig tu gzhag go snyam du rig nas smras pa/ lha de ltar 'tshal te dgum
16a5: mo zhes byas nas/ des de gnas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go// rgyal pos kun nas bkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/ gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba ga re/ des smras pa/ lha khyod kyis das pa lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongs su btang gis sod cig ces
16a6: bka' stsal pas bdag gis de lha'i bka' bzhin du bkum lags so/ / des smras pa/ gsos pa legs so// da ni da dang / skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang / gzhon nu ba lang skyod dang / mdun na 'don kyang sod la khyod nyid cod pan chings te rgyal
16a7: srid byed la rag go/ ngas ko des nga la ma gus pa byas pas ngas den na thur byas la phyis dga' bar bya'o snyam du bsam bsam na khyod kyis mod khon la bsad pa lta zhig/ des smras pa/ lha 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig smras pa'i don dbes kyang
16a8: kun 'tshal bar 'gyur bas re shig dpegasan du gsol/ / bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ khra bo dang ni sgren mo dang // rnyed par dka' dang slu ba dang // mi doms pa dang gnyid gtogs par// bsdus pa'i sdom du yang dag bsdus// sdom ni/ khra bo spre'u dang 'gre
16b1: rkyenang yang bdag stob pa / / rnam la can po thon byung ba phyogs ma 'dra ba dang rigs sas pa sa pa shing tshogs pan la gyis brgyan pa/ seng ga dang / gag dang / dri dang / bral dang / ridags dang / phaganod drug bya chags na
16b2: tshogs kyi brten pa gcig cig sogacags thabs shi can po zhigaga' bams / / des de nas pa sbyin pa rnams kyis bgang na sa chung pa la sprus pa/ yang po khyod kyi 'thas tha di dag par bar ba gyi// dka ni gang yang drang
16b3: bdag nyid 'tshe bar bya'o/ / napa R+Wa dang yul ngan byung ba de'i tsha 'di dag bza' bar bya'o// des smras pa/ legs tong bzhin bya'o// ji tsaman rlu dang nyims pog pas 'bras bu rnams skams te mdade 'gribs par thur pa dang / thabs smras pa
16b4: mongs khyod la khyod kyis 'bras bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya ste/ rlung ngam yul ngan byung ba'i tshe bza' bar bya'o zhes ma bkag gam/ 'o na ci'i phyir khyod kyis zos/ des smras pa/ bdag gis ma zos so// des smras pa/ ngas tshad 'di bkang ste bzhag na/
16b5: gal te khyod kyis ma zos na 'o na tshad 'di ci'i phyir 'gribs par gyur/ des smras pa/ tshad 'di ci'i phyir 'gribs ma shes/ bdag gis ni 'di las 'bras bu cig kyang ma zos so// khyod kyis zos so ngas ma zos so zhes de gnyis lan dang yang lan 'deb
16b6: pan thab mo byung ste des thib mo de mchus bsnun nas srog dang bral te de de nyid na 'phyang zhing 'dug go/ / re shig cig na dus ma yin pa'i char chen po bab pa dang / yang tshad de de kho na bzhin du 'bras bu de dag gis gang nas des bsams pa/ tshang 'di 'bras bu
16b7: dag gis yang gang ba las na des 'di dag mthos so snyam nas/ des de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa/ za bo sdug pa longs shig/ 'di dag khyod kyis mthos te bdag gi tshad 'di gang gis nyes pa gcig bzod par mdzod cig ces byas pa dang / lhas tshigs
16b8: su bcad de smras pa/ nag tshal rgyu ba'i thi ba ni// mdab ma khra bo mig dmar ba// rang gis sdug pa bsad nas ni// blo ngan ci zhig mya ngan byed// ji ltar thib pa bcol spyod pa yis// 'di na sdug pa nyes med bsad nas ni// blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzad
17a1: me zhes/ / de la bzhams te nyes cig bzod gsol pa// de bzhin rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa yis// zhi ba yid dang 'thad pa 'dir bsad nas// blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes// de la bzhams te nyes cig bzod pa gsol zhes bgyi
17a2: ba lags te/ lha khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don ni bdag dpe de dang 'dra ba snyam bgyid do// lha gzhan yang khyim bdag cig dbyar 'das pa dang ston gyi dus su sran ma'i khung 'tshal nas zhing thog tums so// des sran ma'i khung de shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas pazas
17a3: du bshad pa'i sar mchis pa dang / ji tsam na s+pha'i zhig shing de las babs nas sran ma las spar gang blangs te yang shing de las 'dzegs so// de 'jog pa na sran ma 'brum bu cig shong des la lcang nas des sran ma spar gang po de bor te/ sran ma 'brum bu cig
17a4: po de btsal bar brtsams pa na/ khyim bdag des de la bod pa cig bsnun te de dus las 'das pa dang lhas tshigs bcad de smras pa/ sran ma spar gang bor nas su// gang zhig 'brum bu cig tshol ba// shin tu tshogs mang ldan pa yi// spre'u 'di kye ma re mi 'dzangs
17a5: shes bgyi ba lags te lhas gsungs pa'i don gang zhig ba lang skyong go ma bkum nas/ yang bzod pa gsol bar bzhed pa ni bdag dpe de dang / 'dra ba snyam bgyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis tshig cig kho na'i khab lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do//
17a6: des smras pa/ lha ston pa gang zag zla med pa// gcig pu tshig ni gcig gsung ste// gsung ba de ni nges legs pas// 'di la bdag blo 'gyur ma mchis zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma bas na tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir b.lang
17a7: skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga long bar byas so/ / des smras pa/ lha/ lha dang mir bcas 'jig rten 'dir// long ba gnyis ni des grub pa// rang bzhin gyis ni dmus long dang // gang yang chos la mi gnas pa'o// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// gzhan
17a8: yang long ba gnyis lags te/ / gang la sdig lta de yod dam// gang zhig khrims la mi btan pa'o// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ sdom ni/ sman mo cing yang mi rung dang // ma spyad gtun dang lan gcig dang // nad dang pag cha brnyas pa
17b1: dang / de bzhin du ni bags kyis so// byis pa dang ni bshes dag dang // skyes bu tha shal nyid dang ni// shing rta yis ni 'khor lo dang // g.yo gtogs par ni yongs su rdzogs// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma/
17b2: zhi ba bsad pas sgren mor byas so// des smras pa/ lha sgren mo gsum gyi mi mdzes pa khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gsum gang yin/ lnga/ klung ni tu med sgren mo ste// yul 'khor 'dren mod sbyin mo'o// gal te ming po
17b3: bcu yod kyang / / byo med bud med sgren mo'o// zhes bgyi ba lags so// tshal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga cir kyang mi rung bar byas so// des smras pa/ lha 'dzin rten na cir kyang mi rung ba gsum
17b4: mchis par khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ des smras pa/ gsos pa gsum gang yin/ lha/ rta bo thal kar bar bul dang // ston mo bya na med pa dang // bud med gang zhig khyim sun 'byin// 'di gsum cir yang mi rung ba'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos
17b5: pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba longs ma spyad par khyod kyis bsad do/ / des smras pa/ lha/ sol ba byed pa'i gos dang ni// bkru ba shal byed pa'i lham dag dang // rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mkhor rnams ni// longs ma spyad par dengs par 'gyur/ zhes/
17b6: bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ lha de dga' bab shig tu ma pas gzhan yang gsum ste/ nags kyi shing gi me tog dang // dka' thub can gyi lang tsho dang // shing rta mkhan gyi chung ma dag/ longs ma spyad par dengs par 'gyur// rgyal pos smras pa/
17b7: gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis b.lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni gtun gyis brdeg pa'i rgyu'o// des smras pa/ lha/ shing mkhan cang rtsing 'jog pa dang // bzang mkhan skud pa ring po dang // kha lo sgyur ba mig rgyang thung // de gsam gtan
17b8: gyis brdeg ts+tsha'o/ / zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis mgasan tam/ lha de dag 'ba' shig tu ma pas/ gzhan yang gsum ste/ pho nya'i pa nya gang yin dang // mdag gzhug pa yi mngag gzhug dang // bud med 'phyo ni ma byed pa gang // de gsum gtun gyis
18a1: brdeg rgyu'o/ / lha de dag 'ba' shig tu ma pas gzhan yang gsum ste/ gnag rdzi grong na tsA ba dang // 'dreg mkhan nags na rgyu ba dang // mgo pa rtag tu 'od byed pa/ de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ba/
18a2: lang skyong gi ma zhi ba lan gcig gis bsad do// des smras pa/ lha rgyal po smra ba lan gcig ste/ bu mo sbyin pa lan cig go// 'phags pa'i gzigs pa lan gcig ste/ de gsum la na re lan re'o// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras
18a3: ba/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba gas pas khyod ni rang gis nad bslangs so// des smras pa/ lha/ sngar ma sna tshogs go gyo na dang // rtswa mjing chung ngu nor mar dang // rgan po chung ma gzhon len pa/ de dag rang gis nang bslangs
18a4: so/ / zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas da ni khyod la bag tsha'o// des smras pa/ lha/ bka' thub can ni blun mthong dang // dpa' bo rma mtshan med pa dang / bu mo chen
18a5: mo mthong nas ni/ / snying la bag tsha skye bar 'gyur/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad bsang brnyas so// des smras pa/ lha/ cal le col le smra ba dang // gnyis pa gos ngan gyon pa dang
18a6: rgyu zhing za ba gang yin pa/ / de gsum brnyes par bya ba yin// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas ngas khyod dgra zhigs bags kyis spel to// des smras pa/ lha/ nya ni bags
18a7: kyis bza' byar ba/ / ri bo la ni bags kyis gzeg/ don rnams bags kyis bsgrub bya ste// 'di gsum bags kyis bags kyi bya/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad
18a8: pas khyod ni byis pa'o/ / des smras pa/ lha/ ma 'dris pa la yid rton dang // ma rungs pa la sten pa dang // gya tsom du ni yongs gtong ba// byis pa'i mtshan nyid rnam gsum mo// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma bsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang
18b1: gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni bshes pa 'byed pa yin no/ / des smras pa/ lha/ bshes rnams la ni mi sten dang // gnyis pa ha cang sten pa dang // dus ma yin par slong byed pa// des ni bshes rnams 'byed par
18b2: byed/ ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni skyes bu tha shal yin no// des smras pa/ lha/ rtag tu gzhan gyi nor dang ni// bdag nyid 'dod pa rnog byed dang /
18b3: de bzhin sdug bsngal la dga' ba/ de gsum skyes bu tha shal yin/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma bsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyi ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni shing rta'i 'khor los gsad d+ha yin no// des smras
18b4: pa/ lha/ ri mo mkhan ni tshon gtong mi shes dang // 'khrul 'khor mkhan ni 'byor ka mi shes dang // gyad kyi bu ni dor thabs mi shes pa// gsad bya gsad par rtag tu bzlog pa med// ces bgyi ba lhas ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi
18b5: phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyongs gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni g.yon can yin no/ / des smras pa/ lha/ bud med khyo gsum brgyud pa dang / dge slong phyir ni 'ongs pa dang // bya ni rgya las shor dang gsum// g.yon can nang na de g.yod na/ zhes bgyi ba khyod
18b6: kyis ma gsan tam/ sdom ni// rnyed par dka' dang gzhan dang gcig / bsags dang de bzhin mi mthun dang // brdungs dang med pa nyid dang ni// mi 'tsham pa dang don med do// gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma rnyed dka' ba bsad do// des smras pa/ lha/ ri bong rA
18b7: can rnyed par dka'/ / ru sbal spu can rnyed par dka'// smad 'tshong gcig pu 'dug pa dang // gzu bo drang por smra rnyed dka'/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis gzhan gyi ched du ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad/
18b8: do// des smras pa/ lha/ btams pa len dang gnya' bo dang // g.yon can gyi ni che bzhi dang // sman byed blo zhan bzhi po dag/ gzhan gyi don du ma rung 'gyur/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis
19a1: ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad bsad gcig pur byas so/ / des smras pa/ lha skye ba na yang 'di gcig skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'chi ba na yang 'di gcig mchi// skye bo gcig pus 'di na sdug bsngal myong // 'khod pa la ni grogs
19a2: yod ma yin no/ / zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba tshogs bsags pa bsad do// des smras pa/ lha/ nya sgong a mra'i me tog dang // sdug bsngal gyur pa'i don gnyer ba// dper na ston ka'i
19a3: sprin bzhin du/ bsags pa rnams kyang don med 'gyur/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsod pas khyod ni mi za pa yin no// des smras pa/ lha/ nyi ma grib mar mi mthun zhing /
19a4: snang ba dang ni mun pa dang // nyin par mtshan mor mi mthun te// chos dang chos min rtag mi 'thun/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis b.lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni brdung rgyu'o// des smras
19a5: pa lha gos rnams brdungs na 'dam po dag tu 'gyur/ khong bu brdungs na de dag ma gyogs par 'gyur bud med rnams ni brdungs na dbang du 'gyur/ rnga dag ma grazungs smra 'byin mi 'bru re zhes phyi khyod kyis mags na/ ma rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pagang gi phyir khyod kyis ngalang skyo gi ma nib bas dpas khyod ni med par bya ba yin no// des
19a6: smras pa/ lha/ rlung gis sbun pa med par byed// skye bo'i sgra yis glu de bzhin// skyes bu ngan pa bsten pa dang // mi mdzes yon tan med par byed ces bgyi ba khyod kyis mi gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi
19a7: ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/ / des smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po brdzun du smras pa dang // sman pa gsung dang dge sbyong 'khrug/ blo dang ldan pa kun mongs pa// bzhi ni 'tsham pa ma yin no// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal
19b1: pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis don med par ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do// des smras pa/ lha/ nyin par mar me bus pa don med do// rgya mtshor char pa bab pa don med do// 'drangs la ston mo byin pa don med do// skyes bu ngan pa bsten pa don
19b2: med/ / zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ sdom ni/ sku de blta dang ma legs dang // bskrad dang 'jigs dang mi dga' gtad// sred dang ma bsams mya ngan gtogs// de ni tshems su yang dag bsgrags// rgyal pos sbas pa/ gsos pa gang
19b3: gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni slu ba yin no/ / des smras pa/ lha/ srub bzhi mchis par khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ bzhi gang yin/ lha/ mi 'dod pa la 'doms pa dang / gnyid kyis dub la 'chad pa dang // don du gnyer min
19b4: don gnyer dang / stobs dang ldan rnams 'gyed pa'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni blta bar bya ba yin no// des smras pa/ lha/ g.yul ngor dpa' bo blta bya ste/ mi bzang dug la gas
19b5: sngags blta/ / bza' btud tshe na nyes du ste// don rtogs bya la mkhas pa blta/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyi mag san tam// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyi ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas ma legs pa byas so// des smras pa/ lha/ khyim
19b6: pa le lo ma legs chags ma legs/ / rab byur yang dag sdom pa min ma legs// rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa'ang ma legs te// mkhas dang 'khrug byed de yang ma legs so// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos
19b7: pa gang gi phyir khyod kyi ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni bskrad par bya ba yin no/ / des smras pa/ lha/ mi mkhas shing rta gcog pa dang // khal chen 'gel bas glang bsod dang // ha cang bzhos pas be'u gsod dang / nye du'i khyim 'dug chung ma bskrad/ ces bgyi
19b8: ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod mthong nad 'jigs so// des smras pa/ lha/ 'ur ba dang ni chu skyar dang // gsum pa phyag dar srin bu dang // bzhi pa lham bu chu gsher ni// 'jig
20a1: bya min la 'jigs par byed/ / ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba med pas mi dga'o// des smras pa/ lha/ spre'u ni grong na mi dga' ste// chu srin byis pa gsod ril// chom rkun dge
20a2: spyong khyim du sten/ / byi bo rang gi khyim mi dga'/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis pa lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni btang bar bya ba yin no// des smras pa/ lha/ rigs kyi phyir ni gcig cang
20a3: ste/ grong gi phyir ni rigs btang ngo // yul gyi phyir ni grong btang ste/ bdag gi phyir ni yul gtad do// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga'i sred pa 'chang du mi btub
20a4: des smras pa/ lha/ rtswa med gzhan gyi bud med dang // lag pa gcig gis chu 'thung dang // gzhan gyis chang blung gang yin pa/ de dag sred pa 'chang ba med/ ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ma bsams pa kho nar
20a5: ba la da skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/ / des smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po rgyal po'i mdzod ni ma bsams par// lam du zhugs la chom po ma bsams par/ khyim na bud med thab mo ma bsams par// rab tu byung ba'i rnyed pa ma bsams par// zhes bgyi ba khyod
20a6: kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas mya ngan bya ba yin no// des smras pa/ lha/ chags can rgas pa'ang mya ngan bya ba ste/ mi bzang por mo 'ang mya ngan bya ba yin// srad 'tshong rnam pa
20a7: 'angabya ngang bya ba ste/ / rab byung gtum po'ang mya ngan bya ba yin// sdom ni// bsko bas mi ngoms yid 'thang dang // rtse bar mi byin dang ni// slu bar mi byar ba sdad dang // mgon med bshad dang yid brtan pa'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ gams pa/
20a8: khyod kyis nga'i ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba blta bas mi ngomos pa bsad do// des smras pa/ lha/ glang po'i gtso nga rgyal po dang // brgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang // sangs rgyas smra ba rnams kyis chog/ blta ba yis ni mi rims yin// zhes bgyi mthod kyi
20b1: ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba nga'i yid dang 'thad pa bzang ngo // des spras pa/ lha/ gzugs bzang mo dang rigs ldan dang // des dang rigs ni 'phel byed pa// daral bab dang bud med la// rgyal chen yid dang
20b2: ba yin/ / zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod dang lhan cig rtse bar mi bya ba yin no// des smras pa/ lha/ byis pa sbrul dang bral ba dang / gang gi ma ni g.yem pa dang // mi gang
20b3: mdza' ni mi rtag dang / / lhan cig rtse bar mi bya'o// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod kyis nor 'phrog pa byas so// des smras pa/ lha/ rol mo mkhan dang dmag mi dang
20b4: sman pa chom rkun btson rdzi ste/ / de dag nyam thag gyur ba la'ang // nor ni 'phrog par byed pa yin/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gas na tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni smra bar bya ba ma yin no//
20b5: smras pa/ lA/ ho cang phyag dang ha cang dbul// dma' dang ha cang mtho gang dang // ha cang ring dang ha cang te// de drug smra bar bya ba ma ni// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gzhan tam/ rgyal pos smras po// gsos pa gang gi phyir khyad kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi baM
20b6: bsad pas kyad ni sems rab tu snang ba yinan/ / des smras pa/ wa/ sbyin pa mi nang mi mthun byed pa dang // 'thun par ma byed nyes spyong sgrogs pa dang // sbyin pa byin nas rim gyis ldog byed pa// de dag rab tu snang ba'i rtags yin na// nas brgya bakhyod kyis
20b7: ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsang bas nga mgon med par gyur to// des smras pa/ lho// gnas brtan rgyal po rgan po dang // tshul med bka' blo mo bde dang // bla ma la ni gnod byed gang/ de
20b8: drug mgo ni medapang bshad/ ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal bas smrab pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir ba lang skyong gim zhib bsad pas khyod dang lhan cig pa shes par byab ma yin no// dang smras pa/ lha/ gzhad na dpa'an
21a1: mkhan dang mon spang 'tshod cad dang can/ mning de bzhin gzhung ngan pa// de dag dang ni bshes ma bya/ zhes brtse bakhyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis pa lang skyong gim zhib bsad pas khyod ni yid gtan
21a2: par bya ba sa yin no/ / des smras pa/ 2/ sa tsam nub pa'i chu dang rtadang ni// glang po che dang sbe dang sbrul dag dang // su 'greng ba dang gdod gnyer gang ba dang // Sha s+'u sgya la yid ni bstan ma bya/ zhes bya ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ sdom ni gnyid med 'dod pas
21a3: yin dang / kun nas mnar soms dngos po dang // de bzhin snying rje khwa dang ni// zlog thabs tha ma stobs yin no// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gis zhi ba bsad pas ngaganyid med do// des smras pa/ lba/ g.yem dang
21a4: skem nad can dang ni/ / cham pas thebs dang sdug bsngal dang // don sems khros dang brtson pa dang // 'jigs pa de ni rnam kun tu/ gnyid mi 'ong ste 'jig rten na// brgyad ni rang bzhin sdug bsngal lo// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal
21a5: pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas 'dod pa ma yin no// des smras pa/ lha/ 'dod pa ma yin pa'i dngos po brgyad ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ gsos pa brgyad gang yin/ nad dang na dang mchi
21a6: ba dang / / sdug bral mi sdug phrad pa dang / ser ba thog tog mi rtaganyid// brgyad ni 'jig rten 'dod min rab// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis pa lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod la kun nas mnar sems skyes so// des
21a7: smras pa/ lba/ kun nas min sems dgu 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma bsan tam/ gsos pa dgu gang yin/ lha 'di ni bdag la gnod par 'dod pa phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde
21a8: ba ma yin par 'dod pa ste/ 'dis bdag la gnod pa byas so byed do byed par 'gyur ro// snyam mo// yang der di snyam du sems te/ gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung ba bdag gi 'di kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par gal 'gyur/
21b1: snyam nas/ der de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar byed do// 'di ni gang zhig bdag la gnod par 'dod pa phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/ reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/ de
